analyzed: du bral med ba thugs kyi jug med ba gsang ba

analyzed: yi don sdud cig snang rang gtan tshhigs gzhung dang

analyzed: mun ba shes ba gzhung gnyis ba ba yang gnyis su

analyzed: ris byed ba gnyis min dbus med ba gsum du

analyzed: spong len can dang gnyis su byor bde ba lngar snang med

analyzed: rnal byor gsum du tu rnal byor cig mtha yang sdud

analyzed: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs

analyzed: na dod ba yi tha rams dam po char kun gyi

analyzed: mthar mi bzhi lde mig thabs kyis kyi sgo lcags

analyzed: mun ba dod ba gnyis yin ba dang ni rgyang phan ba la

analyzed: yang gnyis yin rigs dang ni rigs ma

analyzed: rigs sgrub byed rigs ba chos blo la mi snang thad

analyzed: gnyis yod la grangs ba jug ba dang dzin rdzas su

analyzed: dod dzin ba yi rigs ba rkyen las las ma grub

analyzed: po chos rnams thams cad ba po yis byed ba

analyzed: phan dod ba dir ston chad ba dang du

analyzed: shes chad sgrub ba rigs ba sdig las kyi chos

analyzed: rnams dang bras bu ma nges chi shing zad lta bur

analyzed: du shes can la gsum yod yul tshhad mar byed nas

analyzed: gnon la sogs tshhad mar ni mos ba du shes ri

analyzed: stegs drug ba la rigs bzhi men spyod ba dod ba

analyzed: lus dang sems la nges med ci log ba jol nyog

analyzed: dag don dang mi ldan ba tshhul chos byed ba men

analyzed: spyod ba tshhad gi phyogs tsham ston ba yi don dang mi ldan rtag chos la yid ches ba dad ba yod ba

analyzed: lung tsham rten ba tshhad ma chos chal ba dod ba

analyzed: gag tshhad mar tsham dzin ba dod ba slong cha

analyzed: dod rol ba dang yang dag sngags ba dang gsang chen

analyzed: yin gzhan gyi min zhes khrul tshhad mar byed ba

analyzed: ma rtogs spyod tsham du phra zab ser skye

analyzed: khrul ba ba lha dang mi ldan kun lha ru dod ba

analyzed: yul las khrul ba tshhad ma spyod ba las khrul ba spyod

original: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs so//
analyzed: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs

analyzed: ting dzin khrul ba tshhad ma chen ba yi dod ba

analyzed: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs

analyzed: shes ba ston ba leu ste lnga

analyzed: dam tshhig bzhi yis rje dzin ba sa non gnas snang

analyzed: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs

analyzed: grol ba leu ste brgyad

analyzed: skye med dbyings nyid ye shes shes rig ba dbyings nyid

analyzed: rang la rdzogs ba ba byed ba tshhad ma yang ba rtshal gyi

analyzed: tshhad ma gyis rtogs na phebs ba ba phyal ba rang

analyzed: bzhin dang tu lhun gyis grub ba tshhogs kyi khyad ba

analyzed: yang srid bkra gsal tshhogs kyi ba bkod cing sgrub mi

analyzed: shes bla ma sa la gcig kun tu khyab ba

analyzed: chu zla tshhul du gro don kyi sgo lcags nyid rnal

original: 'byor gyi don bkrol ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
analyzed: byor gyi don grol ba leu ste dgu

analyzed: shin tu rnal byor don chad bzhin nam mkha rdo rje dang rtogs byed theg ba yang byed theg ba rang bzhin srid

analyzed: rig ba lhun grub ba rtshol ba sgrub mi snang chos

analyzed: la gegs mi gag med ba cir mi gag kun

analyzed: gyi zhing du yi dngos char dgur mi mtshhor nam

original: mkha'i chos snang bzhin/_/dgag sgrub med par sems la rdzogs/_/spyir na
analyzed: mkha chos snang sgrub med ba sems la na

original: theg pa'i bye brag rnams/_/snang ba'i chos 'du chos 'byung bzhin/_/kun
analyzed: theg ba bye brag ba chos du chos byung

original: 'byung kun 'du kun gyi gzhi/_/theg pa mtho dman mthong stangs dang /_/ skabs kyi gdang ngam ri rgyal dang /_/ri phran rnams kyis mthong gsal 'dra/_/
analyzed: byung kun du kun gyi ba mtho dman mthong stangs dang skabs kyi gdang ngam ri rgyal dang phran rnams kyis mthong gsal

analyzed: khyad ba che chung cir snang yang stangs dngos po gcig las

analyzed: snang ba tshan dra gzugs rnyan yis mthong skor mthong ba

analyzed: snang srid mtho dman thams cad dang ba lnga pos sdud ba

analyzed: mthong stangs gsum du mthong ba dag spros bral dngos po

analyzed: rgyal ba dgongs ba spyod las ni rnam dag lam chen

analyzed: can ma skyod rang dgar ba sris ma thim ba

analyzed: gdul byed gdul byed ma grub byed don gyi tha snyad

analyzed: thugs kyi sgo lcags bzhugs

analyzed: da bzhi la rdzogs ba srid rig ba bdag nyid ba

analyzed: chen por bdag nyid can glong la grod ba gyis

analyzed: grub ba ngang nyid na lhun grub nyid du snang grub klong

analyzed: na ngang gnas rtogs bsam gtan bsam gtan ba blo yi
